channel.title: Posts on Tim's Github Page
channel.description: Recent content in Posts on Tim's Github Page

item.title: Create a Blog by Hugo
item.description: 简单记录下如何使用Hugo如何建立Github Page. $ brew install hugo $ hugo new site jinwik.github.io # 使用even主题 $ git clone https://github.com/olOwOlo/hugo-theme-even themes/even # 根据需求修改下配置文件 $ cp themes/even/exampleSite/config.toml . $ hugo server -t even #本
